blog.name: redroadtoadventure
blog.title: Red Road to Adventure
blog.description: A Dungeons & Dragons focused side-blog, including my various campaigns over the three decades I've been playing,(43rd lvl Nakota). Most players in all of my campaigns are/were Natives/Indigenous/First Nations people. Also contains social issues. There may be some boobs/butts. All my d&d stuff (all editions) is tagged #redroadtoadventure, Forgotten Realms 5e is #hoard of the dragon queen or #lost mine of phandelver, DarkSun 4e is #the unquiet sands campaign

dnd blog. I reblog artwork, homebrew, stories, quotes, pretty much anything. Feel free to submit or ask things! I'm happy to answer and reasonably knowledgeable.
I also reblog Critical Role things. 
anything tagged with "uselesstiefling tm" is stuff I made.
both player and DM, currently DMing 2 (and playing an NPC helper in one cause it's a small group)

summary:
me: explaining one of the major plot points to one of my friends
my friend, stopping me:wait so you. you just made clarota from...
body:
me: explaining one of the major plot points to one of my friends

my friend, stopping me:wait so you. you just made clarota from critical role.

me, hesitating: no,,, hes not their friend. (my friend is new to CR)

my friend: so its discounted clarota.

me, softly but with feeling: f u c k

blog.name: twinvax
blog.description: I write and reblog things for my fandoms. Main focus Critical Role. Feel free to send me asks or general headcanons about characters! I have a critical role rp blog! made and role played for Yeza the halfling (chemistyeza.tumblr.com). Asks open!

summary: Okay so I just had a realisation: Matt's deities are not flawless; they have imperfections, they can get scared. So basically...
question: Okay so I just had a realisation: Matt's deities are not flawless; they have imperfections, they can get scared. So basically what I'm saying is what if Fjord finds his powers waning for some reason and he calls Matt and Matt's having a Bad Day and it's like. Hey you've been helping me, it's my turn to help you.
answer:
The Storyteller is definitely not flawless. He probably gets body dysmorphia same as Matt. Also the sciatica pain that made him have to cancel a show.

Simply meaning, Matt isn’t separate from the Storyteller in any way, and he’s actually the real Matt just actually putting himself into the world to be a patron god that is rarely if ever been heard of. 

He’s not a god at all, just a human who has power over the game he plays, and people assume hes a god because they don’t know better. 

I’ll probably write something to this effect later! Thank you!

He’s not a god at all, just a human who has power over the game he plays, and people assume hes a god because they don’t know better. 

I’ll probably write something to this effect later! Thank you!

Simply meaning, Matt isn’t separate from the Storyteller in any way, and he’s actually the real Matt just actually putting himself into the world to be a patron god that is rarely if ever been heard of.

tags: i dunno if he's gonna revived or smth
summary: So uhh I'm watching CR2, right? And I got spoiled on a lot of sh*t; Molly's death, for example. When I reached the 26th ep, I...
body:
So uhh I’m watching CR2, right? And I got spoiled on a lot of sh*t; Molly’s death, for example. When I reached the 26th ep, I knew my beautiful tiefling would die. What I didn’t expect at all was the change of atmosphere. I expected some screams, angry yelling or something of the sort. But the table went completely quiet. I was actually terrified when Taliesin said that he “can’t watch this” and left the table, when Liam left soon after.

Holy sh*t that was intense, these were my thoughts, just holy sh*t over and over again.

Today is the day I once again realized just how powerful role-playing games can be. They can make you laugh and smile or completely wreck you. That’s beautiful and terrifying at the same time. That’s the beauty and the dread of any role-playing game.

I’m not sure if he’s gonna be revived or smth(pls don’t spoil that at least), I think I’ve heard smth about that, but oh well

Sorry, I just had to let it out cuz holy. sh*it. I actually felt sick seeing players’ reactions. That’s the reason I love any role-play.

tags: critical role: the mighty nein campaign
i suck ass at roofs I know
summary: Got bored and I made The Mighty Nein’s new Xhorhas home on Sims 4!  Its titled “Mighty Nein's Xhorhas pad” on the gallery. The...
caption:
Got bored and I made The Mighty Nein’s new Xhorhas home on Sims 4!  Its titled “Mighty Nein’s Xhorhas pad” on the gallery.

The gallery photos are all from a weird angle because of the lot I stuck it in but you’re seeing it from the back above.

I didn’t furnish it so anyone who downloaded it could furnish it themselves! I did take some liberties, like adding lights and windows (feel free to swap or delete any of them!) and I made the tower 4 stories tall because it’s not much of a tower if it’s the same height as the rest of the house lol.  I also had to make adjustments because the Sims 4 doesn’t have circular buildings, spiral staircases, or ladders.

This one does use a few expansion packs (Get Famous, Get to Work, and Seasons I think) but only for a couple windows and other miner things that the game will easily swap in similar things.

Anyway, if you furnish it for the M9 feel free to @ me or share it with me somehow so I can see it!
